name: To Die For
description:
A platformer/ minimalist dating sim <3

Controls:
arrows/ wasd
space bar
mouse
Escape (to exit dialogue you may have seen before)

Credits:

Andrea Hayes, Sunny Woolls, Ben Myres, Benjamin Crooks and Morgan Kunhardt

Note: The ToDieFor_Windows_BugFix1 & ToDieFor_Mac_BugFix1 builds are identical to the other builds, but fix a jumping input bug that was occurring on some PC's.
